attributes.action: When schools return, allow pupils better suited to work from home to do so.
attributes.additional_details: By allowing pupils who study better at home to stay at home, less pupils would be in schools, reducing the transmission of Covid-19, and could increase grades overall with those who study better at home able to do so more of the time
attributes.background: As pupils are due to return to school, pupils have been given a new lease of learning over this lockdown. Whilst many would rather be at school, there are some who work and prosper at home and so should be allowed to remain at home for a better quality of life and study.
